subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Track and Field
Running
lead_paragraph: Galen Rupp, the silver medalist in the 10,000-meter race, faces the 5,000-meter with counsel from his former high school coach and the company of his training partner, the British runner Mo Farah.
snippet: Galen Rupp, the silver medalist in the 10,000-meter race, faces the 5,000-meter with counsel from his former high school coach and the company of his training partner, the British runner Mo Farah.
